entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
